law.catch_line: The Attorney General shall take charge of, prosecute, and defend on behalf of this State every case ...

text.section: The Attorney General shall take charge of, prosecute, and defend on behalf of this State every case arising under the provisions of this subtitle, including the recovery of penalties.
The provisions of this section may not limit or affect the power or authority of State's Attorneys under § 15-102 of the Criminal Procedure Article.
